title: Cast to Array
description: In this lab, we will explore the castArray() function in JavaScript. The purpose of the lab is to understand how to convert a non-array value to an array with a single line of code. By the end of this lab, you will have a clear understanding of how to use the castArray() function to manipulate data structures in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering JavaScript Array Conversion with castArray()
meta.description: Explore the power of the castArray() function to easily convert non-array values to arrays in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, array, castarray, data manipulation, programming tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
